responses: In ADCET, we offer following courses in B.Tech: Computer Science & Engineering, Aeronautical  Engineering, Food Technology, Electrical  Engineering, Civil  Engineering, Mechanical  Engineering, Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, Computer Sci & Engg.(Internet of Things & Cyber Security Including Block Chain Technology), Agreeculture Engineering. I hope it helps you.

responses: Well, it is not necessary that engineering is the only career option for you. There are many more lines of work to explore. One must not regret of what they choose to build their career upon, after all, it is your future. You must think over again as you still have time.

patterns: I do not know about engineering.
What is engineering?
What does an Engineer do?
responses: It is a branch of science and technology which deals with thinking, designing and building logical solutions. Engineers apply the principles of science and mathematics to develop economical solutions to technical problems.

patterns: Who is a computer engineer?
Who is an IT engineer?
responses: Computer engineers or IT engineers focus on innovation—making computing systems safer, faster and more powerful. They develop, test, install, configure and troubleshoot computer hardware and software.

patterns: What is computer engineering?
What is IT engineering?
I want to know more about computer science.
I want to know more about computer engineering
I want to know more about computer science engineering
I want to know more about IT
I want to know more about IT engineering
responses: Computer Engineering or IT grouped under the name Computer Science. The main goal is to configure the hardware and the software to bring a modern solution to a problem. It has wide variety of fields to explore in it along with many opportunities. If you are interested then I will sign you up for our newsletter. Are you interested?

patterns: What is electrical engineering?
What is Ec Engineering?
What is electronics and communication engineering
I want to know more about EC
I want to know more about Electrical engineering
responses: Well it is a wide field to explore. A good thing about it is the freedom, as you can work on both hardware and software. To put it simply, electrical engineers deal with supply and the flow of power and electronics engineer work on making different electrical devices. If you are interested then I will sign you up for our newsletter. Are you interested?

patterns: Who is an electrical engineer?
responses: An electrical engineer is someone who designs and develops new electrical systems, solves problems and tests equipment.

patterns: Who is an EC engineer?
Who is an electronics engineer?
responses: Electronic engineering (also called electronics and communications engineering) is an electrical engineering discipline which utilizes nonlinear and active electrical components such as semiconductor devices, especially transistors, diodes and integrated circuits, to design electronic circuits, devices, VLSI devices and their systems.

responses: I am getting what you are interested in. You may be interested to be in Mechanical department of engineering which has many more areas of study. If you want to know more, please type 'I want to know more about Mechanical engineering engineering'

patterns: Who is a mechanical engineer?
responses: Mechanical engineers design power-producing machines, such as electric generators, internal combustion engines, and steam and gas turbines, as well as power-using machines, such as refrigeration and air-conditioning systems.

patterns: What is mechanical engineering?
I want to know more about mechanical engineering
responses: A career in Mechanical Engineering allows you to build a bright future for you and for the world. It is a creative profession, with an emphasis on designing, simulating and improving the world we live in. There are many more things we can talk about Mechanical Engineering, if you are interested then I will sign you up for our newsletter. Are you interested?

patterns: Who is a civil engineer?
responses: Civil engineers conceive, design, build, supervise, operate, construct and maintain infrastructure projects and systems in the public and private sector, including roads, buildings, airports, tunnels, dams, bridges, and systems for water supply and sewage treatment.

patterns: What is civil engineering?
I want to know more about Civil engineering
responses: Civil Engineers deal with all the infrasctuctures that we live in. Their line of work require the knowledge of construction industries. If you are interested then I will sign you up for our newsletter. Are you interested?

patterns: What is food engineering?
I want to know more about food engineering
Give some information about food technology
responses: Food technology is a branch of food science that deals with the production, preservation, quality control and research and development of food products.

Food technology is the application of food science to the selection, preservation, processing, packaging, distribution, and use of safe food. Related fields include analytical chemistry, biotechnology, engineering, nutrition, quality control, and food safety management.

patterns: What is Aeronautical engineering?
I want to know more about aeronautical engineering
Give some information about aeronautical technology
responses: Aeronautical engineering degrees represent the branch of engineering that deals with the research, design, development, construction, testing.
Aeronautical Engineering is the study, design, and construction of flight-capable machinery, as well as the techniques for operating airplanes and aircraft.

patterns: What is Agreeculture engineering?
I want to know more about Agreeculture engineering
Give some information about Agreeculture technology
responses: Agricultural engineering, also known as agricultural and biosystems engineering, is the field of study and application of engineering science and designs principles for agriculture purposes.

patterns: What is Artificial Intelligence and Data Science engineering?
I want to know more about Artificial Intelligence and Data Science engineering
Give some information about Artificial Intelligence and Data Science technology
responses: Artificial Intelligence and Data Science is a new branch of study that deals with scientific methodologies, processes, and techniques drawn from different domains like statistics, cognitive science, and computing and information science to extract knowledge from structured data and unstructured data.

patterns: What is IOT ?
I want to know more about IOT
Give some information about IOT
responses: IoT software engineering refers to the systematic development of IoT infrastructure using a blend of software and hardware solutions.

patterns: What is  Cyber Security ?
I want to know more about  Cyber Security
Give some information about Cyber Security
responses: Cybersecurity engineers, sometimes called information security engineers, identify threats and vulnerabilities in systems and software, then apply their skills to developing and implementing high-tech solutions to defend against hacking, malware and ransomware, insider threats and all types of cybercrime.

patterns: What is  Block Chain?
I want to know more about  Block Chain
Give some information about Block Chain
responses: Blockchain technology is an advanced database mechanism that allows transparent information sharing within a business network. A blockchain database stores data in blocks that are linked together in a chain.

patterns: Give me the location of college.
I want to know address of college
responses: Ashta, Dist. Sangli, Maharashtra,  416301

ADCET's campus is spread over 25 acres in the heart of the city of Ashtha, Sangli, where 3000 undergraduate students build their lifelong friendships and connections while enjoying their educational journey.

patterns: Tell me the daily working duration of college
responses: Monday - Saturday [09:00 am - 06:30 pm]

patterns: Tell me something about the college.
In which year college started
When the college established
how many years have completed to college
responses: Established in 1999, ADCET, Ashta is an Autonomous institute affiliated to Shivaji University, Kolhapur, Maharashtra and approved by AICTE, New Delhi. The institute is NAAC accredited with “A” grade, ISO 9001:2015 certified and runs programmes accredited by NBA, New Delhi. The community and culture of ADCET, Ashta are enriched by active bright students, dedicated teachers, and commitment to impart quality education in Engineering.

patterns: Tell me something about the college achievement.
Is ADCET autonomous?
Is ADCET NAAC 'A' graded institute ?
which affiliations ADCET has achieved since 1999?
responses: ADCET, Ashta is an Autonomous institute affiliated to Shivaji University, Kolhapur, Maharashtra and approved by AICTE, New Delhi. The institute is NAAC accredited with “A” grade, ISO 9001:2015 certified and runs programmes accredited by NBA, New Delhi.

patterns: Give me some information about the college fees.
How much amount do we need to pay to take admission in ADCET?
responses: FEES charged by the Institute : Rs 1,07000/- (One Lakh Seven Thousand only). For Catagory Students : As applicable, Scholarship granted by Govt. of Maharashtra. will be deducted from the total fees, rest the students have to pay at the time of admission.
